name: voicing
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
present participle of
voice
C2 to say what you think about a particular subject, especially to express a doubt, complaint, etc. that you have about it: I have voiced my objections to the plan to management.
phonetics
  specialized to produce a sound by making the vocal cords move very quickly several times
